channel.title: Rubycoin getting cut from Bittrex
channel.description:
Got an email update from rubycoin community. ___________________________________________________________ #general View in the archives
stoner19 12:27 PM, December 7th @everyone In the near future Bittrex will be implementing significant changes that will not only affect your user accounts but will also affect the ability for programs such as TraderDaddy to work on any scale. Please read up on this: https://support.bittrex.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003004171-What-are-my-trade-limits- And if you are in the Bittrex Slack then *PUT UP A FIGHTING ARUGMENT WHY THEY NO LONGER HAVE USERS/TRADERS IN THEIR BEST INTERESTS*

item.title: Rubycoin getting cut from Bittrex
item.dc:creator: @Mantrack
item.description:
@Mantrack wrote:

Hopefully Blocknet like projects will replace centralized exchanges! We need those DEX so much!

Read full topic

item.title: Rubycoin getting cut from Bittrex
item.dc:creator: @Craig Craig
item.description:
@Craig wrote:

Their bot was about the only simplified easy button bot in the industry.
Sold my 500 coins

Viva la DEX revolution

Read full topic

item.title: Rubycoin getting cut from Bittrex
item.dc:creator: @Craig Craig
item.description:
@Craig wrote:

Got an email update from rubycoin community.

#general View in the archives

stoner19 12:27 PM, December 7th
@everyone In the near future Bittrex will be implementing significant changes that will not only affect your user accounts but will also affect the ability for programs such as TraderDaddy to work on any scale.
Please read up on this: https://support.bittrex.com/hc/en-us/articles/115003004171-What-are-my-trade-limits-
And if you are in the Bittrex Slack then PUT UP A FIGHTING ARUGMENT WHY THEY NO LONGER HAVE USERS/TRADERS IN THEIR BEST INTERESTS
